items.title: How to stay safe online?
items.text: Learn the most common cyber security threats & the measures you can take to keep you safe on the internet.

items.title: Ransomeware
items.text: Ransomeware is a malicious software to block you from access to a computer system until a sum of money is paid.

items.title: Online Shopping Fraud
items.text: If you see something being sold for a price that seems too good to be true, it is probably online purchase fraud.

items.title: Mobile Devices Malware
items.text: Most mobile malware is designed to disable a mobile device, allow a malicious user to remotely control the device or to steal personal information stored on the device.
